title: KitchenAid 5 Ultra Power Speed Hand Mixer - KHM512, Aqua Sky
descriptions:
**Product Title:** KitchenAid 5 Ultra Power Speed Hand Mixer - KHM512, Aqua Sky

**Product Description:**

Experience the ultimate in mixing power and convenience with the KitchenAid 5 Ultra Power Speed Hand Mixer - KHM512 in Aqua Sky. As the #1 Mixer Brand in the World, KitchenAid brings you a premium hand mixer designed to make quick work of even the toughest mixing tasks.

**Key Features:**

* 5 ultra-powerful speeds to tackle a variety of mixing tasks, from slowly stirring in nuts and chocolate chips to whipping egg whites and heavy cream
* Lockable swivel cord for easy storage and reduced clutter
* Single-handed accessory removal button for convenient beater release
* Includes 2 Stainless Steel Turbo Beater Accessories, perfect for heavy-duty mixing tasks
* Dishwasher-safe accessories for easy cleaning
* Compact and lightweight design for reduced fatigue and easy maneuverability

**Perfect for:**

* Mixing nuts and chocolate chips
* Whipping meringues
* Handling cookie dough
* Mashing potatoes
* Stirring in chunky ingredients
* Whipping egg whites
* Whipping heavy cream

**Why Choose KitchenAid?**

* #1 Mixer Brand in the World, based on retail sales revenue (USD) and all retail channels (source: Euromonitor International Ltd.)
* Backed by a trusted brand with a reputation for quality and performance
